page.title: 18Wroxall parents.
page.content: My Dad shoots rabbits and he takes them to a Pub.He gets a pound for every rabbit he shoots. ****************** I go to work with my Mum.I help her clean the offices.There are five offices.Mum gets ten pounds a week and she gives me one pound. ****************** My Mum's favourite pop star is Cliff Richard and she works at an old men and ladies' Home.My Dad is a bricklayer and he likes listening to the radio and playing table-tennis. ****************** My Dad runs a farm.He has got six calves. One of the baby calves was born on the Downs.My Dad feeds them on milk powder and hot water. ****************** My Dad drives a bus and sometimes he doesn't come home untill 12 o' clock.
